Text: now in Russian when you enter in game 4 row and select English and that's it enjoy

Thanks j_rambo, nice upload, +1 from me. Cheers.
Note: To change the language to english, just go to the Darkest of Daysbaseinterface folder and open the user file, then go down to the language line and change the number 5 to 0, done.
Works perfectly, thank you j_rambo.  And thanks to Cerebral222 for instructions on changing to English.
